DESCRIPTION: Makes the tags on your server able to be installed from any server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}tagpublic [Tag Names]** ~ Makes all tags public so other servers can install them on their servers.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: Note: You can enter as many tags as you like and it will make them public.
EXPORTED: The tags have been successfully made public.
ALIASES: Tagpublic does not have any aliases.
